title: The Walking Dead Season 2 PC Free
description:
Get The Walking Dead Season 2 for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
The Walking Dead: Season Two continues the story of Clementine, a young girl orphaned by the undead apocalypse. Left to fend for herself, she has been forced to learn how to survive in a world gone mad. Many months have passed since the events seen in Season One of The Walking Dead, and Clementine is searching for safety.
But what can an ordinary child do to stay alive when the living can be just as bad – and sometimes worse – than the dead? As Clementine , you will be tested by situations and dilemmas that will test your morals and your instinct for survival. Your decisions and actions will change the story around you, in this sequel to 2012’s Game of the Year. ULTRAKILL

system_requirements.Graphics: ATI or nVidia card with 512 MB RAM
